mapper.select: SELECT reg_dt AS reg_dt, package_nm AS package_nm, server_type AS server_type, os_type AS os_type, device_id AS device_id, user_id AS user_id, page_id AS page_id, device_model AS device_model, req_url AS req_url, com_type AS com_type, avg_com_sensitivity AS avg_com_sensitivity, avg_cpu_usage AS avg_cpu_usage, sim_operator_nm AS sim_operator_nm, app_ver AS app_ver, page_start_tm AS page_start_tm, page_end_tm AS page_end_tm, intervaltime AS intervaltime, loading_time AS loading_time, response_time AS response_time, log_type AS log_type, wtf_flag AS wtf_flag FROM maxy_device_page_flow WHERE page_start_tm_dt >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND reg_dt > toDateTime64('{{ start_iso }}', 3) AND loading_time > 10 AND (wtf_flag = 'Y' or log_type = 1048592) ORDER BY reg_dt
